predicate.note: Frames file for 'overdo' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: adjectival
example.text: There were concerns early in the day that Wall Street's sharp gains on Tuesday were overdone and due for a reversal.
example.arg: Wall Street's sharp gains on Tuesday

example.name: active?
example.text: John overdid his two-minute egg by cooking it for half an hour.
example.arg: by cooking it for half an hour
